name: Togakushi Ski Resort
description: Togakushi Ski Resort, also known as Togakushi Snow World, provides a secluded skiing experience with deserted slopes on weekdays. The base area boasts a quaint charm, albeit with somewhat run-down buildings. Togakushi is famous for its exquisite soba noodles, and the village holds historical significance as a potential birthplace of ninjutsu. The resort features two peaks, seven chairlifts, and 19 courses, offering hidden tree runs and easy sidecountry access.
